EmailTemplate.name: Consolidation-NCDJPA_0329.No Show
EmailTemplate.subject: Watch the Replay: Consolidation: Breaking Technological and Political Barriers to Build Regional Partnerships
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for Attending! Consolidation: Breaking Technological and Political Barriers to Build Regional Partnerships Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Public Safety Professional}},
Thank you for your registering for our webinar on Consolidation: Breaking Technological and Political Barriers to Build Regional Partnerships. We know how busy things get and understand that you couldn't make it, but we thought you might be interested in viewing the recording.
From the presentation, Charlie's key takeaways include:
Consolidation...
- doesn't necessarily mean the elimination of an organization. - is a refinement and effective way to bring together operations in a region to better serve the community - make systems very efficient through personnel and technology, and being creative with how we approach them.
Webinar Replay Details:
- Watch the webinar replay now <http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/zwpzcrw> - Get the slides <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/March29Webinar_Consolidation_Presentation.pdf>
Questions? Jenny Clavero TriTech Software Systems (858) 799-7362 jenny.clavero@tritech.com
